Class Deck

  • java.lang.Object
    • Deck

  • public class Deck
extends Object
    Program simulates a deck of cards, creating a 52 card deck for a card game.

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      static int CARDS_IN_DECK
      Number of cards in standard deck
      private int count 
      private Card[] deck 

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      Deck()
      Default Constructor a regular 52-card deck in an initially ordered order.

      Create a new collection of 52 cards, in sorted order

      Creates a new deck of specified size

      Randomize the order of Cards in Deck
